name: centralized-platform
description: Centralized platform for delivery management using AWS Amplify and Node.js 22

scripts.build:frontend: mkdir -p dist && cp -r index.html login-aws-native.html src/ assets/ dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:amplify: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cp index.html login-aws-native.html build/ && cp src/pages/*.html build/ && cp _redirects build/ && cp -r assets build/assets && cp -r src/utils build/utils && cp -r src/components build/components && cp -r src/config build/config
scripts.build:dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp index.html login-aws-native.html dist/ && cp -r assets dist/ && cp -r src/components dist/ && cp -r src/config dist/ && cp -r src/pages dist/ && cp -r src/utils dist/
